p: Reactive oxygen species (ROS) production was monitored as L-012-dependent chemiluminescence (CL). EC 50 and IC 50 values were determined by nonlinear regression analysis of the dose-response curves, as described under Section 3.5, and are presented as the mean ±S.D. of three independent experiments. For the stimulation of ROS production, neutrophils were pretreated with phorbol-12-myristate-13-acetate (PMA) (100 nM). N.A., no inhibitory activity was found at concentrations up to 50 µM. *Instead of inhibition, 1,3-dithiane directly activated neutrophil ROS production (see below).
